page.title: 03Attitudes,Arts,Crafts,Clubs
page.content: {Attitudes}The inhabitants of both villages are agreed that a very caring and kindly attitude exists and epecially in Falkenham there is support and cooperation from all section of the community. {Arts & crafts}An enthusiast in Falkenham spins and weaves wool from her own pet sheep. The same lady also does lace making as a hobby {Clubs}Having no hall, Falkenham residents attend activities in Kirton, which are as follows. At the hurch hall, Kirton. Mother and Toddler club. (mothers and children under 6) Wed 2pm Playgroup (children 3-5) Mon, Tues, Wed, and Fridays at 9.30 am Brownies (girls 7-11) Tues 4.15pm Guides (girls 10-14) Thur 7.00pm Todllers Dancing Class (under 5) Tues 3.00pm
